net.tinyos.prowler

Class TestBroadcastNode.BroadcastApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tinyos.prowler.Application
      • net.tinyos.prowler.TestBroadcastNode.BroadcastApplication
  • Enclosing class:
    TestBroadcastNode

    public class TestBroadcastNode.BroadcastApplication
extends Application
    This extension of the Application baseclass does everything we expect from the broadcast application, simply forwards the message once, and that is it.
